name: Minecraft: Minecon Live - Rush Race!
summary: Minecraft: Minecon Live - Rush Race! is a thrilling and dynamic mini-game that captures the excitement of competitive obstacle courses. Created as part of the Minecon Live celebration, it challenges players to race through imaginative tracks filled with parkour sections, traps, and puzzles. The game emphasizes speed, skill, and strategy as players compete against each other in vibrant and ever-changing environments, making it a perfect showcase of Minecraft’s creativity and community spirit.
